thread.section_title: First Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Dream come true
thread.title_full: Dream come true - Review of First Hotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: curph2017
title: Dream come true
text: My daughter Olivia has always wanted to go to Paris, so we decided to plan a trip to visit Paris for her 18th birthday. We booked two nights in the First Hotel after reading some very good reviews. The hotel was lovely and the staff were very friendly and extremely helpful. Our room was clean and had everything we needed. My daughter stayed in the wheelchair accessible room (which was a larger room) that met all her needs. The gentleman on reception the day we left helped to carry our cases to the taxi outside. We would certainly stay here again.
